TextView.android:text: IL Take care app downloaded and screenshot shared
Previous year policy provided and any break-in then reason mentioned on statement. Renewal policy/ Rollover policy.
Keys Impression and statement regarding the keys.
If insured forgot the key in the ignition then u have to take his statement on affidavit of 20 rupees and ignition word has to be used.
NON repossession letter and Financier mail ID and contact number
Insured name mentioned over the keys and insured photo along with the
Insured photo holding the statement and key.
Bank Passbook clear and duly verified or 25- Cancelled Cheque
If original RC stolen then RC particular along with form 26 duly signed
If IV is on loan then form 35 and loan statement and NON repossession letter.
FIR if FIR not filed then police application/ FIR delay then reason
Indemnity Bond on 200 and satisfaction letter on 10 rupees stamp paper.
UP112 call record if call done
Motor vehicle Tax receipt if Insured vehicle was unregistered.
Pan Card if insured having no PAN then form 60 is mandatory.
In commercial vehicle Permit, Fitness, collected
Driver statement and contact detail in commercial vehicle
